issue.title: Not able to visualise ur10 in gzweb / gazebo7

content.raw:
Note that gzweb 2.0.0 is still in development and is unstable at the moment. If the real/sim time are stuck at 0 then that means something is wrong with the gzweb bridge and no data are being sent to the browser.  

Could you give gzweb 1.3.0 a try? I inserted a [ur10](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_models/src/f8f2f9af8a59da5f5c60416a29eecdfae5f90125/ur10/?at=default) model in gazebo and it showed up in gzweb
content.html:
Note that gzweb 2.0.0 is still in development and is unstable at the moment. If the real/sim time are stuck at 0 then that means something is wrong with the gzweb bridge and no data are being sent to the browser.

Could you give gzweb 1.3.0 a try? I inserted a ur10 model in gazebo and it showed up in gzweb
